snippet.title: Billy Bumbum: A Cheeky Puzzler - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Billy Bumbum: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1752730/Billy_Bumbum_A_Cheeky_Puzzler/

Start warming up your brain! You'll need it as you solve SO MANY puzzles and save the day as your favorite cube-shaped dragon's butt Billy! Truly a hero of legend. FART FOR FREEDOM!

Billy Bumbum is OUT NOW on Steam. With over 250 thinky puzzles crafted by expert puzzle designers Bumbum will keep you challenged for hours on end.

We should probably mention that Billy's Bumbum should be your one and only bum! Stay away from other bums without consent!

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/KSWu4qPkCf
Sign up for the newsletter: https://frambosa.games/newsletter/
